Indinesia: President Sukarno announces his "Conception" (Konsepsi) of the nature of Indonesia. This will eventually lead to Guided Democracy
Regional rebellions in Sumatra and Sulawesi. (to August 1961)
Martial law is proclaimed. On the same day, the cabinet resigns.
Sukarno appoints a "Working Cabinet" with Djuanda as prime minister.
An attempt is made to assassinate President Sukarno. Grenades are thrown at him as he visits a school in Cikini, Jakarta.
